act_info.full_title: Special Hockey Day Act, 2018, S.O. 2018, c. 17, Sched. 39

content.content:
1 March 27, 2019 is proclaimed as Special Hockey Day. Note: Section 2 comes into force on a day to be named by proclamation of the Lieutenant Governor. Repeal 2 On the day this section comes into force, this Act is repealed. 3 Omitted
(provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 4 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). ______________  Français
content.raw_html:
1 March 27, 2019 is proclaimed as Special Hockey Day.

Note: Section 2 comes into force on a day to be named by proclamation of the Lieutenant Governor.

Repeal

2 On the day this section comes into force, this Act is repealed.

3 Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act).

4 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).

______________

 

Français
